entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
